summary:
Better Thieves Guild is a modification of Andrew!\'s \"Better Thieves Guild Entrance/Exit\" which adds a map teleport marker to the graveyard in Riften for easy Thieves Guild access. The mod also moves the exit teleport marker to the graveyard to bypass the sliding gravestone.

The original mod can be found here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedf
descriptionHtml:
Better Thieves Guild is a modification of Andrew!\'s \"Better Thieves Guild Entrance/Exit\" which adds a map teleport marker to the graveyard in Riften for easy Thieves Guild access. The mod also moves the exit teleport marker to the graveyard to bypass the sliding gravestone.

The original mod can be found [url= http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8688&searchtext=better+thieves+guild]Here[/url].

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[u][b]My modifications:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Moved map markers closer to the sliding gravestone for realism
[*]Added hidden treasure to The Ragged Flagon
[/list]


Please endorse my mod if you enjoyed it, and please post any comments/suggestions to help me make it even better!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Better Thieves Guild is also on the Skyrim Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19674]Here[/url].[/b]

Also, check out my other mods!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10330]The Man Cave[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14319]Better Item Sorting[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15107]Better Leveling Merchants and Speechcraft[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15462]Better Map Marker Placements[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15446]Better Follower Dialogue Priority[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17020]No More Mine Pests[/url]
author: eagledude4
